    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewDef

        public ViewDef(java.lang.String aliasedName)
        throws javax.jdo.JDOUserException

        Create ViewDef.

        Parameters:
        aliasedName - String View names can be aliased. Aliased names have the form name.alias or name AS alias where both name and/or alias can be enclosed in double quotes.
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOUserException

      • ViewDef

        public ViewDef(java.lang.String aliasedName,
               ColumnDef... columnDefs)

        Create ViewDef and add columns.

        Parameters:
        aliasedName - String View names can be aliased.
        columnDefs - ColumnDef… Aliased names have the form name.alias or name AS alias where both name and/or alias can be enclosed in double quotes.
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOUserException

      • ViewDef

        public ViewDef(java.lang.String aliasedName,
               java.util.Collection<ColumnDef> columnDefs)

        Create ViewDef and add columns.

        Parameters:
        aliasedName - String View names can be aliased.
        columnDefs - Collection<ColumnDef> Aliased names have the form name.alias or name AS alias where both name and/or alias can be enclosed in double quotes.
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOUserException

      • setRecordClassName

        public ViewDef setRecordClassName(java.lang.String className)

        Set the class of Record object that must be used to iterate this View.

        This method will only effectively set the class if it can be loaded by calling Class.forName() else the record class will be set to null.
        Parameters:
        className - String Fully qualified class name
        Returns:
        ViewDef this
